mapper.insert: insert into t_banner (title, type, sort, imageUrl, linkUrl, createTime, userId) values (#{title}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{imageUrl}, #{linkUrl}, now(), #{userId})
mapper.update: update t_banner set title = #{title}, type = #{type}, sort = #{sort}, imageUrl = #{imageUrl}, linkUrl = #{linkUrl}, userId = #{userId} where bannerId = #{bannerId}
